name: com.serve402/mcp-server
title: serve402 — Pay-per-use AI Agent Tools
description: Web fetch, search, code execution, screenshots, PDFs, and XRPL queries. No API keys — agents pay per request with USDC on Base or XRP via x402 protocol. Works with Claude Desktop, Cursor, Windsurf, and any MCP-compatible client.

tools.name: serve402_fetch
tools.description: Extract readable content from any URL ($0.005/request)

tools.name: serve402_execute
tools.description: Run Python or JavaScript in a secure sandbox ($0.005/request)

tools.name: serve402_screenshot
tools.description: Capture a webpage as PNG or JPEG ($0.003/request)

tools.name: serve402_pdf
tools.description: Generate a PDF from any URL ($0.003/request)

required.description: EVM wallet private key (0x...) with USDC on Base mainnet

optional.description: XRPL wallet seed (s...) — required when SERVE402_PAYMENT_NETWORK=xrpl
